text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the morning light
Shining through my window bright
Feeling like the world's all right
Everything is outta sight

[Verse 2]
Steppin' out with a smile so wide
Dancing through the streets with pride
Can't wipe this joy I can't hide
Feel the love it's nationwide

[Chorus]
Sunshine days
We're having fun
Smiling faces
Everyone
Laugh and play until day's done
Living life just like we won

[Verse 3]
Everyday's a chance to shine
Grab your dreams
Make 'em mine
In this moment we align
Hearts and souls
Pure design

[Bridge]
La la la
Let's sing out loud
La la la
We're feeling proud
La la la
Above the crowd
La la la
On a cloud

[Chorus]
Sunshine days
We're having fun
Smiling faces
Everyone
Laugh and play until day's done
Living life just like we won
title: Sunshine Days
